news.author: Joe Rossignol
news.title: Here's How to Listen to Apple's Upcoming Earnings Call With Tim Cook
news.description:
Apple has announced that it will share earnings results for the third quarter of its 2025 fiscal year on Thursday, July 31. Apple's earnings reports are typically released at 1:30 p.m. Eastern Time, shortly after the stock market has closed in New York.
